chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: The tracking function does not work with ups, it only shows a sign that the website is loading and the order should have arrived last week, but it hasn't arrived yet and I can't track the order. Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Angelica - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner informed us that the parcel is returning to our warehouse as the customer never replied to the carrier for a delivery time. Please check with the customer and inform us if the customer would prefer a refund or reshipment. 

Thank you.
Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

According to the shipment tracking, you received the parcel on 22-05-2024.

Please resend the parcel to the customer and inform me of the tracking number within one working day.

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

May we have confirm that the customer wants the device to be reshipped to the same address?

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901142733

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB
